name: Giga Run
description:
Are you ready for a super fun run race? Giga Run will be your favorite runner of all times!
Avoid all the obstacles and collect all the coins on your way.

Giga Run features:
◉ Addictive gameplay
◉ Beautiful handmade 3d graphics
◉ Endless fun
◉ Collect coins to unlock new skins
◉ Haptic Feedback
◉ Optimization for all screens
